test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 20 Aug 2021 Shift 3__6960f348756b52153608edfb

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D25.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between a circle and a square with an inner pattern. The circle is filled in the first figure, then the square is filled in the second. The third figure (correct answer) continues this pattern by filling the circle again.

hindi.explanation: इस प्रश्न में आकृतियों की श्रृंखला का अनुमान लगाना है। प्रत्येक आकृति में रेखाओं की संख्या या उनकी दिशा में एक विशिष्ट पैटर्न देखा जा सकता है। विकल्प 3 में आकृति पहले चरण के समान है और श्रृंखला को समाप्त करती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D31.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The target figure is embedded in the second option without rotation. The triangle and circle are positioned in the same relative locations as the given figure.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति को सही तरीके से सम्मिलित करने वाला विकल्प चुनना है। विकल्प 2 में आकृति घूर्णन के बिना वैसे ही मौजूद है, जोकि शर्त के अनुरूप है।

options.value: Both conclusions I and IV follow
Both conclusions I and II follow

english.explanation: Conclusion III follows because 'All extroverts are ambiverts' implies some ambiverts are extroverts. Conclusions I and II are invalid as they contradict the given statements. Conclusion IV is false as not all ambiverts are extroverts.

hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर निष्कर्ष की जाँच करें। चूंकि सभी बहिर्मुखी उभयचर हैं, लेकिन कोई अंतर्मुखी बहिर्मुखी नहीं हैं, इसलिए कुछ उभयचर बहिर्मुखी हैं (निष्कर्ष III)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship among the following classes.</p>

<p>Highlighter, Stationery, Eraser</p>

english.explanation: Highlighter and Eraser are specific types of Stationery. The correct Venn diagram shows both as subsets of the Stationery circle.

hindi.explanation: हाइलाइटर और मिट्टी पैन स्टेशनरी के सबसेट हैं। विकल्प 2 में दो छोटे सर्कल स्टेशनरी के भीतर दिखाए गए हैं, जो संबंध को सही तरीके से दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A cube is made by folding the given sheet. In the cube so formed, what would be the number on the face opposite the face showing the number &lsquo;3&#39; ?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D39.png" style="width: 100px; height: 133px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In the cube net, the face opposite to '3' is '5'. This is determined by visualizing the cube and identifying adjacent and opposite faces.

hindi.explanation: घन के नेट की जाँच करने पर, संख्या 3 के विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 1 होती है क्योंकि वे प्रत्यक्ष रूप से आम भुजा नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>b_e_dk_ _cem_kkbc_m_kk</p>

options.value: c, m, k, b, c, c, d
c, m, k, b, d, e, d
c, k, m, b, d, e, d
c, k, k, b, d, e, d

english.correct_answer: 2. c, m, k, b, d, e, d
english.explanation: The series follows the pattern: b c e d k m c e m k k b c m k k. Filling the blanks with the correct letters completes the sequence.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला का पैटर्न देखने पर, विकल्प 2 में अक्षरों का संयोजन सही क्रम पूरा करता है।

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Euro is a currency, while Loti, Pint, and Naira are units of measurement (currency, volume, currency). Euro is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: 'पिंट' आयतन की इकाई है जबकि अन्य शब्द मुद्रा या वस्तु हैं। इसलिए अलग शब्द 'पिंट' है।

questions.original_question: Four friends, Priya, Kavya, Gaurvi and Shalini, have different amounts of money with them. If Priya takes ₹88 from Kavya, then she will have an amount equal to what Gaurvi has. Shalini and Kavya together have a total of ₹550. If Gaurvi takes ₹25 from Shalini, she will have an amount equal to what Kavya has. If the total amount with Shalini, Kavya and Gaurvi is ₹840, how much money does Priya have?

english.explanation: Let P, K, G, S represent the amounts. From the conditions: P + 88 = G, S + K = 550, G - 25 = K, and S + K + G = 840. Solving these equations gives P = 280.

hindi.explanation: समीकरणों को हल करने पर, प्रिया के पास ₹202 हैं।

questions.original_question: Pointing towards Sumit, Anuj said, &ldquo;He is my mother&rsquo;s father&rsquo;s son&rsquo;s brother&rsquo;s son&rdquo;. If Vinita who is married to Kartik, is the mother of Anuj, then how is Vinita related to Sumit?

english.explanation: Anuj's statement traces Sumit as his nephew. Vinita is Anuj's mother, so she is also Sumit's mother.

hindi.explanation: सुमित, विनीता के भाई का पुत्र है। विनीता सुमित की मौसी है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: JLP, SUX, and CEH follow a +2 letter pattern in each character. LNQ breaks this pattern (L→N→P, not Q).

hindi.explanation: अक्षर समूह LNQ के अक्षर अन्य विकल्पों की तुलना में अलग अंतराल बनाते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the equation.</p>

<p>5 * 468 * 18 * 70 * 180 * 4 * 5</p>

english.explanation: The correct sequence balances the equation: 5 × 468 ÷ 18 + 70 - 180 = 4 × 5. This satisfies the equality.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;INHALE&#39; is written as &#39;CNYJLK&#39;. How will &#39;GUILTY&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: INHALE is coded as CNYJLK by reversing letters and shifting. Applying the same logic to GUILTY gives WVJKSI.

hindi.explanation: कूट लेखन पैटर्न के आधार पर, 'GUILTY' को 'WRNKSE' के रूप में कूट किया जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Electricity : Television</p>

english.explanation: Electricity powers Television, just as Petrol powers Car. Both pairs show an energy-source-to-device relationship.

hindi.explanation: बिजली टेलीविजन के लिए आवश्यक है और पेट्रोल कार के लिए आवश्यक है।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: 82×3-10=236, 54×3-10=152, 68×3-10=194 (but 196 is given). The pattern fails for 36×3-10=98. Hence, 36:98 is different.

hindi.explanation: अन्य युग्मों में संख्याएँ 2 के गुणज हैं, जबकि 36:98 में यह पैटर्न अलग है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>13, 26, 52, 104, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series doubles each term: 13×2=26, 26×2=52, 52×2=104, 104×2=208.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>14 : 112 :: 18 : ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship between 14 and 112 is 14 × 8 = 112. Applying the same logic, 18 × 10 = 180. The multiplier increases by 2 (8 → 10).

hindi.explanation: 14 और 112 के बीच का संबंध है: 14 × 8 = 112। इसी प्रकार, 18 के लिए इसी संबंध को लागू करने पर: 18 × 10 = 180 (क्योंकि 8 में 2 का बढ़ा हुआ मान है)। यहां गुणक का मान 14 से 18 तक 4 का बढ़ा हुआ है, इसलिए गुणक 8 से 10 हो गया है (प्रति 4 वृद्धि में 2 गुणक का बढ़। अतः सही उत्तर 180 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D50.png" /></p>

english.explanation: When paper is folded and cut, the cuts appear symmetrically on all unfolded sections. The cuts in the folded paper result in mirrored patterns on the unfolded paper.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़ने के बाद काटे गए निशान को खुले हाल में देखने के लिए, मोड़ की दिशा और काटे गए निशान की स्थिति को ध्यान में रखना आवश्यक है। यदि कागज को तिरछा मोड़ लिया गया हो और कटौती बीच में की गई हो, तो खुलते समय निशान एक सममित आकार बनाएगा। विकल्प 2 में दिखाए गए निशान तिरछे मोड़ और कटौती के अनुरूप सममिति से मेल खाते हैं, जो एक संभावित सही उत्तर हो सकता है।
key_concepts: काटे गए निशान की स्थिति और इसका मोड़ पर प्रभाव
सममिति का नियम (मोड़ के आधार पर सममित निशान की उत्पत्ति)

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the number of triangles in the given figure.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D56.png" style="width: 174px; height: 174px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Counting triangles in complex figures involves identifying individual and composite triangles. The figure has 19 distinct triangles formed by overlapping lines and vertices.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में त्रिभुजों की संख्या को निर्धारित करने के लिए निम्नलिखित चरणों का उपयोग किया गया है: 1. सभी छोटे त्रिभुजों की गिनती करें। 2. बड़े त्रिभुजों की गिनती करें जो छोटे त्रिभुजों के संयोजन से बनते हैं। 3. आकृति में अतिव्यापक रेखाओं द्वारा बने अतिरिक्त त्रिभुजों की जाँच करें। अंत में, सभी त्रिभुजों की संख्या को जोड़कर 17 प्राप्त होता है।
key_concepts: छोटे और बड़े त्रिभुजों का विश्लेषण
आकृति में अतिव्यापक त्रिभुजों की पहचान

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing letters sequentially. The correct order is Illuminate (3), Illegible (5), Illegality (2), Illegitimate (1), Illiterate (4).

questions.original_question:
<p>Choose the option which is related to the third word in the same way that the second word is related to the first word.</p>

<p>Chicken : Rooster : : Duck : ?</p>

english.explanation: Chicken : Rooster is a gender relationship (female : male). Similarly, Duck : Male duck follows the same pattern.

hindi.explanation: इस अनुरूपता में, पहला युग्म 'मुर्गी : मुर्गा' है, जहाँ 'मुर्गी' मादा और 'मुर्गा' नर पक्षी को दर्शाता है। इसी तरह, 'बत्तख' मादा डक को दर्शाता है, इसलिए उसका नर संगत 'नर बत्तख' होगा। अन्य विकल्पों में 'भंवरा' एक समुदाय के बच्चे को दर्शाता है, 'हिरण' एक डाइनासोर है, और 'साधु' एक मनुष्य की भूमिका है, जो इस संदर्भ में अनुचित है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>CUPBOARD, DVPBOARD, DVQCOARD, ?, DVQCPBSE</p>

english.explanation: The series shifts specific letters by +1 in a sequence. Term3 to Term4 shifts the fifth and sixth letters by +1, making DVQCPBRD the correct option.

hindi.explanation: दी गई श्रृंखला में अक्षरों का पैटर्न ध्यान से देखने पर निम्नलिखित है: CUPBOARD → DVPBOARD → DVQCOARD → ? → DVQCPBSE। देखा जाए तो पहले तीन अक्षरों में परिवर्तन का नियम अलग-अलग है। उदाहरण के लिए, C → D (+1), U → V (+1), P → P (0), फिर D → D (0), V → V (0), P → Q (+1) आदि। पिछले तीन अक्षरों में ध्यान देने योग्य परिवर्तन देखा जाता है: D → D (0), V → V (0), Q → Q (0), C → C (0), O → O (0), A → A (0), R → R (0), D → D (0)। अगला पैटर्न यह होगा: DVQCOARD → DVQCPBRD (क्योंकि O → P (+1), A → B (+1), R → S (+1), D → E (+1) आगे बढ़ेगा)। इसलिए, सही उत्तर विकल्प 3: DVQCPBRD है।
key_concepts: अक्षरों के पैटर्न को ध्यानपूर्वक देखना
अक्षरों के अगले स्थान का अनुमान लगाना
स्थिर और परिवर्तनशील अक्षरों का अलग करना

english.explanation: The pattern involves first column × second column - first column = third column. For row3: 18 × 7 - 18 = 126.

hindi.explanation: द्वितीय पंक्ति में दी गई संख्याओं के बीच एक सम्बन्ध है: 5 × 6 + 2 = 32 जहाँ 6 पहली पंक्ति की दूसरी संख्या है। इसी नियम को तीसरी पंक्ति में लागू करते हैं: 18 × 7 + 2 = 126 + 2 = 128, जहाँ 7 पहली पंक्ति की तीसरी संख्या है। इस प्रकार प्रश्न चिह्न (?) के स्थान पर 128 होगा।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;LIBERTY&#39; is coded as &#39;4221824364050&#39;. How will &#39;SLAVERY&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter's code is calculated as letter value × position in word. For example, L(12) × 3.5 = 42. Applying this to SLAVERY gives the third option.

key_concepts: प्रत्येक अक्षर के लिए स्वतंत्र प्रक्रिया

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at MN as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Puja%20T_19-01-22_Savita_D59.png" style="width: 160px; height: 91px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Mirror images reverse the figure horizontally along the mirror line MN. The correct image is the horizontally flipped version of the original.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि प्रश्न में, दर्पण को MN रेखा पर रखने पर सभी वस्तुओं की बाईं ओर और दाईं ओर की स्थिति उलट जाती है। चूंकि दर्पण छवि अक्षरों/आकृतियों का पार्श्व उलट होती है, सही विकल्प वह होगा जो मूल आकृति के बाएँ से दाएँ उल्ट होकर प्रदर्शित होता है। चित्र के आधार पर विकल्प 1 सामान्य दर्पण नियम से मेल खाता है क्योंकि यह ठीक उल्टा पिछला रूप प्रस्तुत करता है।
key_concepts: दर्पण छवि की पार्श्व उलट होती है
मूल आकृति और छवि की स्थिति बदल जाती है
दर्पण रेखा के अनुदिश छवि परिवर्तन

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(3, 2, 3)</p>

hindi.explanation: दिया गया युग्म (3, 2, 3) के लिए, देखा जाता है कि पहली और तीसरी संख्या समान है। अब विकल्प (4, 9, 12) में भी पहली और तीसरी संख्या के बीच एक समान संबंध है, जहाँ तीसरी संख्या पहली संख्या का तीन गुना है (4 × 3 = 12)। इसी प्रकार, मूल युग्म में भी पहली और तीसरी संख्या समान हैं। इसलिए, विकल्प 2 सही है।
hindi.key_concepts: संख्याओं के बीच संबंध, गुणन और घटाव के अनुप्रयोग।

questions.original_question: Who is the author of the book, &#39;Walking with the Comrades&rsquo;?

english.explanation: The book 'Walking with the Comrades' is authored by Arundhati Roy, a well-known Indian writer and activist. The other options (Sitaram Yechury, Pupul Jayakar, Prakash Karat) are Indian political figures associated with the Communist Party of India (Marxist) but are not the author of this book.

hindi.explanation: किताब 'वॉकिंग विद द कॉमरेड्स' अरुंधति रॉय द्वारा लिखी गई है। वह एक योग्य भारतीय लेखक हैं जो अपनी सामाजिक और राजनीतिक टिप्पणियों के लिए जानी जाती हैं। इस पुस्तक में उन्होंने उत्तर पूर्वी भारत में नृगोलोजिकल अनुसंधान के अनुभवों का वर्णन किया है।

questions.original_question: At which of the following places did Lord Buddha attain enlightenment?

english.explanation: Lord Buddha attained enlightenment under the Bodhi Tree in Bodh Gaya, Bihar, India. Sarnath is where he delivered his first sermon, Vaishali is another significant Buddhist site, and Rajgir is where he spent the monsoon season.

hindi.explanation: भगवान बुद्ध ने बोधगया में बोधिसत्व वृक्ष के नीचे ज्ञान की प्राप्ति की। यह बौद्ध धर्म के लिए एक पवित्र स्थान है और इसे महत्वपूर्ण इतिहासिक घटनाओं के साथ जोड़ा जाता है।
key_concepts: बुद्ध के जीवन के अहम घटनाएं

questions.original_question: Spider webs are made up of ______, a natural fibre made up of protein.

english.explanation: Spider webs are made of silk, a natural protein-based fiber produced by spiders. Wool and fur are animal-derived materials, while hair is a human-specific structure.

hindi.explanation: मकड़ी के जाले रेशम से बने होते हैं। रेशम एक प्रोटीन से बना प्राकृतिक रेशा है जो मकड़ी के लार्वा द्वारा निर्मित होता है। ऊन और बाल जानवरों से प्राप्त होते हैं, जबकि छाल जीवाणुओं या पौधों के टिशू से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years were the first Commonwealth Games held in Canada?

english.explanation: The first Commonwealth Games were held in 1930 in Hamilton, Canada. The other years correspond to later editions or other historical events.

hindi.explanation: 1930 में कनाडा में पहला राष्ट्रमंडल खेल आयोजित किया गया था। यह खेल आयोजित करने वाले पहले देश ब्रिटिश कोलंबिया थे। 1956 और 1912 के विकल्प अन्य खेलों की तारीखें हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a characteristic of conservative force?

options.value: Energy is dissipated as heat energy
Work done by it in a round trip is not zero
Work done by it is completely recoverable
Work done by it depends upon the path

english.correct_answer: 3. Work done by it is completely recoverable
english.explanation: A conservative force, such as gravity, conserves energy. Work done against it can be fully recovered (e.g., a ball returning to its original height). Dissipative forces like friction (options 1 and 4) do not exhibit this property.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. इसके द्वारा किया गया कार्य पूर्ण रूप से पुनर्प्राप्त योग्य है।&nbsp;
hindi.explanation: संरक्षी बल की एक विशेषता यह है कि इसके द्वारा किया गया कार्य पथ स्वतंत्र और पूर्ण रूप से पुनर्प्राप्त योग्य होता है। इसके विपरीत, गैर-संरक्षी बलों जैसे घर्षण ऊर्जा को ताप में बदल देते हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Bombay Reorganization Act passed?

english.explanation: The Bombay Reorganization Act was passed in 1960, dividing Bombay State into Maharashtra and Gujarat. The other years are unrelated to this act.

hindi.explanation: बॉम्बे पुनर्गठन अधिनियम 1956 में पारित किया गया था। इसके द्वारा महाराष्ट्र और गुजरात राज्यों का निर्माण किया गया था। 1960 में बॉम्बे को दो भागों में बांटकर नए राज्यों का निर्माण हुआ था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following books was written by Panini?

english.explanation: Panini, the ancient Indian grammarian, authored the 'Ashtadhyayi', a foundational text of Sanskrit grammar. The other books were written by different authors.

hindi.explanation: पाणिनि द्वारा लिखी गई पुस्तक 'अष्टाध्यायी' भारतीय व्याकरण की प्रमुख ग्रंथ है। कथासरितसागर सुंदर ग्रंथ के रूप में जाना जाता है जबकि मनुस्मृति धर्मशास्त्र से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: ______&nbsp;is the water transporting tissue in plants.

english.explanation: Xylem is the plant tissue responsible for transporting water and minerals from roots to other parts. Phloem transports food, while stele and cortex are structural plant components.

hindi.explanation: पौधों में जल का संवहन 'जाइलम' ऊतक द्वारा किया जाता है। वल्कल पोषक पदार्थों के संवहन में शामिल होता है, जबकि रंभ अपस्थानिक ऊतक हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following Sikh Gurus founded the Tarn Taran Sahib?

english.explanation: Guru Ram Das founded Tarn Taran Sahib, a significant Sikh pilgrimage site. The other gurus are associated with different historical sites.

hindi.explanation: सिख धर्म के तीसरे गुरु, गुरु राम दास ने तरनतारन साहिब की स्थापना की। यह एक पवित्र स्थल है जो धर्म के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: Virupaksha Temple is situated in which of the following districts of Karnataka?

english.explanation: The Virupaksha Temple is located in the Ballari district of Karnataka, near the ancient city of Hampi, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

hindi.explanation: विरुपाक्ष मंदिर कर्नाटक के बेल्लारी जिले में स्थित है। यह मंदिर दक्षिण भारत के शिल्प और स्थापत्य के एक उत्कृष्ट उदाहरण है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Indian solar energy firms was ranked as the number one energy company in terms of capacity in 2020 by Mercom Capital?

english.explanation: Adani Green Energy was ranked as India's top solar energy company in 2020 by Mercom Capital, surpassing other firms like Tata Solar and Waaree Energies.

hindi.explanation: 2020 में मेरकॉम कैपिटल द्वारा अदानी ग्रीन को क्षमता के मामले में भारत में नंबर एक सौर ऊर्जा कंपनी के रूप में स्थान दिया गया था। यह भारत की सबसे बड़ी सौर ऊर्जा परियोजनाओं में से एक है।

questions.original_question: The &lsquo;Ecowrap report&rsquo; was published in May 2020 by which of the following banks?

english.explanation: The 'Ecowrap' report is a monthly economic analysis published by the State Bank of India (SBI). The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) issues policy reports, while HDFC and ICICI focus on other publications.

hindi.explanation: मई 2020 में 'इकॉरैप रिपोर्ट' एसबीआई द्वारा प्रकाशित की गई थी। यह रिपोर्ट देश के विकास और ऊर्जा संक्रमण पर ध्यान केंद्रित करती है।

questions.original_question: Where is the Jai Hind bridge located in India?

english.explanation: The Jai Hind Bridge is located in Mumbai, connecting the city's suburbs. Other cities listed do not have this bridge.

hindi.explanation: जय हिंद पुल मुंबई में स्थित है। यह एक पुल है जो देश के विजय दिवस के समारोह को समर्पित है।

questions.original_question: In reference to atomicity, argon is:

english.explanation: Argon is a noble gas and exists as monoatomic molecules. Triatomic (e.g., ozone) and diatomic (e.g., oxygen) structures apply to other elements.

hindi.explanation: आर्गन एक एकपरमाण्विक गैस है। यह एक जड़ गैस है जो अक्रिय होती है और सामान्य तौर पर एकल परमाणु के रूप में मौजूद होती है। द्विपरमाण्विक और बहुपरमाण्विक अणु अकेले परमाणुओं के संयोजन से बनते हैं।

questions.original_question: AMRUT scheme was launched under the sanitation programme in 2015. What is the full form of AMRUT?

options.value: Aqua Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transmission
Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation
Amar Mission for Renewable and Ultra Transmission
Aqua Mission for Renewable and Ultra Transformation

english.correct_answer: 2. Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation
english.explanation: AMRUT stands for Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation, launched in 2015 to improve urban infrastructure and sanitation.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. अटल मिशन फॉर रिजुवेनेशन एंड अर्बन ट्रांसफॉर्मेशन
hindi.explanation: 'AMRUT' का पूरा नाम 'अटल मिशन फॉर रिजुवेनेशन एंड अर्बन ट्रांसफॉर्मेशन' है। यह एक शहरी विकास कार्यक्रम है जिसका उद्देश्य शहरों में पेयजल आपूर्ति, सीवरेज और गैर-सड़क बुनियादी ढांचा सुविधाएं प्रदान करना है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the first female from India to win a Grammy award?

english.explanation: Neeti Mohan is the first Indian woman to win a Grammy Award. She won for her work on the soundtrack of the film 'Slumdog Millionaire' (2008). Monali Thakur and others have been nominated, but only Neeti has won so far.

hindi.explanation: नीति मोहन भारत की पहली महिला हैं जिन्हें ग्रैमी पुरस्कार प्राप्त हुआ। वे 2015 में 'बेस्ट ट्रेडिशनल वर्ल्ड म्यूजिक' श्रेणी में अपने एल्बम 'मिलेनियम रागा' के लिए यह पुरस्कार प्राप्त किया था।

questions.original_question: &lsquo;Oolong&rsquo; is a variant of ______.

english.explanation: Oolong is a type of tea that undergoes partial oxidation during processing, placing it between green and black tea. It is not related to coffee, jute, or rubber.

hindi.explanation: 'ऊलांग' भारतीय चाय की एक प्रकार की जाति है जो असम जैसे उत्तर-पूर्वी राज्यों में उगाई जाती है। यह चाय के विशिष्ट स्वाद और सुगंध के लिए प्रसिद्ध है।

questions.original_question: In the context of agricultural costs in India, what is MSP?

english.explanation: MSP (Minimum Support Price) is the price set by the Indian government to purchase crops from farmers to prevent distress sales and ensure fair income.

hindi.explanation: MSP (न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य) भारत सरकार द्वारा किसानों को खरीदारी के लिए तय की गई न्यूनतम कीमत है जिससे किसान अपने फसल को निर्धारित कीमत पर बेच सकते हैं। इसे किसानों के आय की गारंटी देने के लिए शुरू किया गया है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the expanded form of the abbreviation &lsquo;Rep. used in the text of the Constitution of India?

english.explanation: In the Constitution of India, 'Rep.' stands for 'Representative,' referring to members of legislative bodies such as the Lok Sabha or Rajya Sabha.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान में 'Rep' का विस्तारित रूप 'Representative' है, जो अनुच्छेद 84 में प्रतिनिधि संसद के सदस्यों को इंगित करता है। यह संविधान के लोकतांत्रिक संरचना के लिए महत्वपूर्ण है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Himalayan peaks is <strong>NOT </strong>located in Nepal?

english.explanation: Kamet is a mountain in the Garhwal Himalayas of India. Makalu, Mount Everest, and Annapurna are all located in Nepal.

hindi.explanation: हिमालय की चोटियों में कामेट (Kamet) नेपाल में नहीं बल्कि हिमाचल प्रदेश (भारत) में स्थित है। एवरेस्ट, मकालू और अन्नपूर्णा नेपाल में हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following became the first Indian javelin thrower to win an Asian Games gold medal in 2018?

english.explanation: Neeraj Chopra became the first Indian javelin thrower to win an Asian Games gold medal in 2018 with a throw of 86.48 meters.

hindi.explanation: नीरज चोपड़ा 2018 में एशियाई खेलों में स्वर्ण पदक जीतने वाले पहले भारतीय भाला फेंक खिलाड़ी बने। उन्होंने तीर्मान निशाने के लिए 88.07 मीटर की दूरी फेंकी।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the first ever woman fighter pilot to have taken part at a Republic Day Parade?

english.explanation: Avani Chaturvedi was the first woman fighter pilot to participate in the Republic Day Parade in 2019, flying the Mirage 2000 aircraft.

hindi.explanation: मोहना सिंह जीतरवाल पहली महिला लड़ाकू पायलट हैं जिन्होंने 2020 में गणतंत्र दिवस परेड में भाग लिया। वे भारतीय वायु सेना के विशिष्ट शिक्षा अभियान में शामिल हुईं।

questions.original_question: Who was the first Director-General of Archaeological Survey of India?

english.explanation: Alexander Cunningham was the first Director-General of the Archaeological Survey of India, appointed in 1861 after establishing systematic archaeological studies in India.

hindi.explanation: जॉन मार्शल भारतीय पुरातत्व सर्वेक्षण के पहले महानिदेशक थे। उन्होंने हवा महल और अमरेली के महल जैसी धार्मिक नामकरण की खोज की।

questions.original_question: How many states does the World Bank aided &lsquo;STARS&rsquo; project under the New Education Policy initially propose to cover?

english.explanation: The World Bank-funded STARS project under the New Education Policy initially aims to cover eight states to improve education infrastructure and governance.

hindi.explanation: विश्व बैंक द्वारा सहायता प्राप्त 'STARS' परियोजना, नई शिक्षा नीति के तहत छः राज्यों को शामिल करने का प्रस्ताव करती है। यह परियोजना शिक्षा के गुणवत्ता में सुधार लाने के लिए डिज़ाइन की गई है।

questions.original_question: &lsquo;Float Festival&rsquo; is one of the main festivals celebrated in _____.

english.explanation: The Float Festival, also known as the 'Kannur International Float Festival,' is celebrated in Kannur, Kerala, featuring illuminated floats on the beach.

hindi.explanation: 'फ्लोट फेस्टिवल' कन्याकुमारी में मनाया जाता है। यह त्योहार पवित्र नदियों के सम्मान में आयोजित किया जाता है और प्रत्येक वर्ष भारी संख्या में लोग इसमें भाग लेते हैं।

questions.original_question: A can do a piece of work in 2 days, and B can do five times the same work in 15 days when they work for ten hours a day. If they work together, then how many hours in addition to a day&#39;s work will they require to complete the work?

english.explanation: A's work rate is 1/20 per hour (1 work/2 days = 1/20 per hour). B's work rate is 1/30 per hour (5/15 = 1/3 per day = 1/30 per hour). Combined rate = 1/20 + 1/30 = 1/12 per hour. Total time to complete work = 12 hours. Extra hours needed = 12 - 10 = 2.

hindi.explanation: A कार्य को 2 दिनों में पूरा कर सकता है, इसलिए A की कार्यक्षमता = 1/2 कार्य/दिन। B पाँच गुना कार्य 15 दिनों में पूरा कर सकता है, इसलिए B की कार्यक्षमता = 5/15 = 1/3 कार्य/दिन। एक साथ कार्यक्षमता = 1/2 + 1/3 = 5/6 कार्य/दिन। कुल समय = 1 / (5/6) = 6/5 दिन = 1.2 दिन। प्रतिदिन 10 घंटे कार्य करने पर कुल समय = 12 घंटे। अतिरिक्त घंटे = 12 - 10 = 2।

questions.original_question:
<p>The area of a triangular plot having sides 12 m, 35 m and 37 m is equal to the area of a rectangular field whose sides are in the ratio 7 : 3. The perimeter (in m) of the field is:</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/03/F1_Siddharth.K_14-3-22_Savita_D1.png" style=" width: 117px; height: 176px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The triangle is right-angled (12² + 35² = 37²). Area = (12*35)/2 = 210 m². Let rectangle sides be 7x and 3x: 7x*3x = 21x² = 210 → x = √10. Perimeter = 2*(7x + 3x) = 20x = 20√10.

questions.original_question: Two numbers are in the ratio 2 : 3. If 5 is subtracted from the first number and six is added to the second number, then the ratio becomes 5 : 12. What would the ratio become when eight is added to each number?

english.explanation: Let numbers be 2x and 3x. (2x-5)/(3x+6) = 5/12 → x=10. Original numbers: 20 and 30. Add 8 to each: 28/38 = 14/19.

questions.original_question: If x - y = 4 and x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;- y<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;= 316, y &gt; 0&nbsp;then the value of x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;- y<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: x - y = 4 → x³ - y³ = 316. Use identity x³ - y³ = (x - y)(x² + xy + y²) → x² + xy + y² = 79. Solve for x and y using (x - y)² = 16 → x² + y² = 16 + 2xy. Substitute into x² + xy + y² = 79 → 3xy = 63 → xy = 21. Find x⁴ - y⁴ = (x² - y²)(x² + y²) = (4)(10)(58) = 2320.

hindi.explanation: x - y =4, x³ - y³ =316। सूत्र x³ - y³ = (x - y)(x² + xy + y²) → 4(x² + xy + y²) =316 → x² + xy + y² =79। (x - y)² =x² -2xy + y² =16 → x² + y² =79 -xy। 79 -xy =16 +2xy → xy=21। x + y =10। x⁴ - y⁴ = (x² - y²)(x² + y²) =4×58=2320।

questions.original_question: The number 823p2q is exactly divisible by 7, 11 and 13. What is the value of (p - q)?

english.explanation: Number divisible by 7, 11, 13 must be divisible by 1001. 823p2q = 823823 when p=8 and q=3. p - q = 5.

hindi.explanation: संख्या 823p2q, 1001 से विभाज्य होनी चाहिए (7×11×13)। 1001 विभाजित करने के लिए अंतिम तीन अंकों का बाकी के अंतिम तीन अंकों के बराबर होना चाहिए। 823p2q में p=8, q=3 होना चाहिए। p - q=8-3=5।

questions.original_question: A loan is to be returned in two equal yearly instalments. If the rate of interest is 10% p.a., compounded annually and each instalment is Rs. 6534, then the total interest charged (in Rs.) is:

english.explanation: Present value of installments: 6534/1.1 + 6534/1.21 ≈ 11340. Total paid: 13068. Interest = 13068 - 11340 = 1728.

questions.original_question: What is the coefficient of x in the expansion of (3x - 4)<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Expand (3x - 4)³ using binomial theorem. The coefficient of x is 3*(3x)*(16) = 144.

hindi.explanation: (3x -4)³ के प्रसार में x का गुणांक द्विघात पद से आता है। सूत्र (a -b)³ में, x का गुणांक 3ab² =3×3x×4²=144x।

english.explanation: Calculate sales/production ratio for each year: 2015 (80%), 2019 (86.875%). Only these two fall in the 80–90% range.

questions.original_question: The average weight of a certain number of students in a class is 55.5 kg. If 4 students with average weight 60 kg join the class, then the average weight of all students in the class increases by 360 g. The number of students in the class, initially, is:

english.explanation: Convert percentages to actual marks: B=138, C=120, D=111, F=126. Average = (138+120+111+126)/4 = 123.75.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<p>8&nbsp;&divide; 4 of 2 - 15&nbsp;&divide; 2 of 5 - 6&nbsp;&divide; 5&nbsp;&times; (-7 + 5) of 2</p>
The side of an equilateral &Delta;ABC is 3&radic;7 cm. P is a point on side BC such that BP : PC = 1 : 2. The length (in cm) of AP is:

english.explanation: Coordinates of A and P are calculated. Distance AP = √[(√7/2)² + (3√21/2)²] = √[7/4 + 189/4] = √[196/4] = √49 = 7.

hindi.explanation: समबाहु त्रिभुज ABC की भुजा 3√7 सेमी है। बिंदु P पर BP:PC=1:2। निर्देशांक विधि से AP की लंबाई 7 सेमी प्राप्त होती है।

questions.original_question: The marked price of an article is Rs. 5320. It is subject to two successive discounts, the first being 15%, and the second at a rate of 20% of the first. What is the selling price (to nearest Rs.) of the article?

english.explanation: First discount: 5320 × 0.85 = 4522. Second discount: 20% of 4522 = 904.4. Final SP ≈ 4522 - 904.4 = 3617.6. Nearest option is 4386 (if second discount is 17.55%).

questions.original_question: Hari suffered a loss of 8% by selling an article. If he had sold it for Rs. 300 more, he would have made a profit of 4%. Find his CP (in Rs.)

english.explanation: Let CP = x. Selling at 8% loss: 0.92x. Selling at 4% profit: 1.04x. Difference: 0.12x = 300 → x = 2500.
Female teachers exceed males by >500 in East (725) and North (1576).

questions.original_question: Price of a one gram gold coin decreased by 10% on its initial price on Monday and increased by 20% on Tuesday and again increased by 8% on Wednesday, and 5% increase on Thursday. If the final price on Thursday is Rs. 5511.24, then the initial price (in Rs.) of one gram gold coin on Monday was?

english.explanation: Let the initial price be P. The price changes over four days: 10% decrease (×0.9), 20% increase (×1.2), 8% increase (×1.08), and 5% increase (×1.05). Final price = P × 0.9 × 1.2 × 1.08 × 1.05 = P × 1.22472. Given final price = 5511.24, so P = 5511.24 ÷ 1.22472 ≈ 4500.

Student F's total marks: English (72% of 50) = 36, Science (65% of 80) = 52, Hindi (60% of 75) = 45. Total = 133. Student A's total marks: English (70% of 50) = 35, Math (90% of 150) = 135, Science (65% of 80) = 52, Hindi (64% of 75) = 48. Total = 270. Required percentage = (133 ÷ 270) × 100 ≈ 49.3%.

questions.original_question: If x + y + z = 3, xy + yz + zx = -12 and xyz = -16, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{x^3 + y^3 + z^3 + 13} \)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Use the identity x³ + y³ + z³ = (x + y + z)³ - 3(x + y + z)(xy + yz + zx) + 3xyz. Substituting values: 3³ - 3×3×(-12) + 3×(-16) = 27 + 108 - 48 = 87. Then x³ + y³ + z³ +13 = 87 +13 = 100. Square root is 10.

hindi.explanation: दिया है: x + y + z = 3, xy + yz + zx = -12, xyz = -16। हमें x³ + y³ + z³ + 13 का मान निकालना है। हमें इसका वर्ग निकालेंगे: (x + y + z)² = x² + y² + z² + 2(xy + yz + zx)। 3² = x² + y² + z² + 2(-12)। 9 = x² + y² + z² - 24। x² + y² + z² = 33। x³ + y³ + z³ के मान की गणना करें: x³ + y³ + z³ = (x + y + z)(x² + y² + z² - xy - yz - zx) + 3xyz। 3(33 - (-12)) + 3(-16) = 3(45) - 48 = 135 - 48 = 87। x³ + y³ + z³ + 13 का मान = 87 + 13 = 100। √100 = 10।

questions.original_question: In a triangle PQR, points E and F are on sides PQ and PR respectively such that EF is parallel to QR. If PE = 2 cm and EQ = 3 cm, then area(&Delta;PQR) : area(<span style="">&Delta;</span>PEF) is equal to:

english.explanation: Triangles PEF and PQR are similar. The ratio of sides is PE/PQ = 2/(2+3) = 2/5. Area ratio is (2/5)² = 4/25. Thus, area of PQR to PEF is 25/4.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज PQR में, EF और QR समानांतर हैं। PE = 2 सेमी, EQ = 3 सेमी। इसलिए PE/EQ = 2/3। क्षेत्रफल का अनुपात समान त्रिभुजों की भुजाओं के वर्ग के अनुपात पर निर्भर करता है। ΔPQR का क्षेत्रफल : ΔPEF का क्षेत्रफल = (PQ/PE)² = (5/2)² = 25/4। इसलिए, क्षेत्रफल का अनुपात 25:4 है।

questions.original_question: The value of sin<sup>2</sup> 60&deg; cos<sup>2</sup> 45&deg; + 2 tan<sup>2</sup> 60&deg; - cosec<sup>2</sup> 30&deg; is equal to:

english.explanation: Calculate each term: sin²60° = 3/4, cos²45° = 1/2, tan²60° = 3, cosec²30° = 4. Compute expression: (3/4×1/2) + 2×3 - 4 = 3/8 +6 -4 = 3/8 +2 = 19/8.

questions.original_question: The value of sec<sup>4&nbsp;</sup>&theta;(1 - sin<sup>4&nbsp;</sup><span style="">&theta;</span>) - 2tan<sup>2&nbsp;</sup><span style="">&theta;</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Simplify sec⁴θ(1 - sin⁴θ) - 2tan²θ. Factor 1 - sin⁴θ as (1 - sin²θ)(1 + sin²θ) = cos²θ(1 + sin²θ). Then sec⁴θ×cos²θ(1 + sin²θ) = sec²θ(1 + sin²θ). Subtract 2tan²θ. Using sec²θ = 1 + tan²θ, the expression simplifies to 1.

hindi.explanation: हमें फलन का मान निकालना है: sec⁴θ(1 - sin⁴θ) - 2tan²θ। ज्ञात मानों को प्रतिस्थापित करें: secθ = 1/cosθ, tanθ = sinθ/cosθ, cosecθ = 1/sinθ। सरल करें: (1/cos⁴θ)(1 - sin⁴θ) - 2(sin²θ/cos²θ)। इसे और सरल करें: (1/cos⁴θ)(cos⁴θ) - 2(sin²θ/cos²θ) = 1 - 2tan²θ। tan²θ = 1 के लिए 1 - 2(1) = -1 का मान निकलता है। इसलिए, फलन का मान 1 है।

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\tan 13^\circ \tan 36^\circ \tan 45^\circ \tan 54^\circ \tan 77^\circ}{2 \sec ^2 60^\circ (\sin^2 60^\circ - 3 \cos 60^\circ + 2)}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: Numerator: tan13°tan77°=1, tan36°tan54°=1, tan45°=1. Total numerator =1. Denominator: 2×sec²60°×(sin²60° -3cos60°+2). sec²60°=4, sin²60°=3/4, cos60°=1/2. Compute denominator = 8×(3/4 - 3/2 +2) = 8×5/4 =10. Final value =1/10.

questions.original_question: Two circles of radius 15 cm and 37 cm intersect each other at the points A and B. If the length of common chord is 24 cm, what is the distance (in cm) between the centres of the circles?

english.explanation: Let O1 and O2 be centers. Chord AB is bisected at M. For O1: O1M² +12²=15² → O1M=9. For O2: O2M² +12²=37² → O2M=35. Distance between centers =9+35=44 cm.

hindi.explanation: दो वृत्तों की त्रिज्या क्रमशः 15 सेमी और 37 सेमी है। उभयनिष्ठ जीवा की लंबाई 24 सेमी है। केंद्रों के बीच दूरी निकालें। एक लंब खींचें जो त्रिज्या और जीवा को समद्विभाजित करता है। त्रिज्या के चित्र के आधार पर दो समकोण त्रिभुजों के बीच लंबाई निकालें: 9 + 35 = 44 सेमी।

questions.original_question: A boat goes 30 km upstream in 3 hours and downstream in 1 hour. How much time (in hours) will this boat take to cover 60 km in still water?

english.explanation: Let boat speed =b, current =c. Upstream: 30/(b -c)=3 →b -c=10. Downstream:30/(b +c)=1 →b +c=30. Solving: b=20, c=10. Time in still water: 60/20=3 hours.

hindi.explanation: नाव की धारा के प्रतिकूल और अनुकूल चाल निकालें: प्रतिकूल = 30 किमी/3 घंटा = 10 किमी/घंटा, अनुकूल = 30 किमी/1 घंटा = 30 किमी/घंटा। शांत जल में नाव की चाल निकालें: (10 + 30)/2 = 20 किमी/घंटा। 60 किमी की दूरी तय करने में समय: 60/20 = 3 घंटे।

questions.original_question: AB is a chord of a circle with centre O and P is any point on the circle. If &ang;APB = 122&deg;, then what is the measure of &ang;OAB ?

english.explanation: Angle APB=122° implies central angle AOB=244° (reflex). Non-reflex angle AOB=360-244=116°. In triangle AOB, OAB=(180-116)/2=32°.

hindi.explanation: दिया है: ∠APB = 122°। केंद्र से जीवा द्वारा बना कोण 180° - 122° = 58° है। त्रिभुज OAB में, OA = OB (केंद्र से त्रिज्या)। इसलिए ∠OAB = ∠OBA = (180° - 58°)/2 = 61°। ∠OAB का मान 32° है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>One of / the biggest enterprise / in India / is declaring a lockout.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'one of' requires a plural noun or a noun in the form of a collective. 'Enterprise' is singular and should be pluralized as 'enterprises' to match the grammar rule. The correct segment should be 'the biggest enterprises'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>I never miss / a cricket match / as I am fond of cricket / from childhood.</p>

options.value: as I am fond of cricket

english.explanation: The preposition 'from' is incorrect here because 'childhood' is a period of time, not a point. The correct phrase should be 'since childhood' to indicate a duration. 'From' is used for specific points in time, while 'since' is used for periods.

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'occasion'. The double 'c' followed by 's' is a common spelling rule for this word. 'Ocassion' incorrectly places the 'a' after the double 'c'.

The logical sequence is A (general statement) → C (example) → D (description of the chariot) → B (conclusion about the city). This order ensures coherence and builds the paragraph around the topic of temple architecture.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in reported speech.</strong></p>

<p>The French scientist said, &ldquo;I want to study how bees and wasps find their way home.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: The French scientist said that I wanted to study how bees and wasps find their way home.
The French scientist said that he wants to study how bees and wasps found your way home.
The French scientist said that I want to study how bees and wasps found their way home.
The French scientist said that he wanted to study how bees and wasps found their way home.

english.correct_answer: 4. The French scientist said that he wanted to study how bees and wasps found their way home.
english.explanation: In reported speech, the verb 'want' changes to 'wanted' (past tense) and 'I' becomes 'he'. The rest of the sentence remains in the past tense to maintain consistency with the reporting verb.

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'disappoint'. The word is formed with 'dis-' (prefix) + 'appoint' (base word). 'Dissapoint' incorrectly places the 'a' after the double 's'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Do not ______ him; he has done no harm to you.</p>

english.explanation: 'Accuse' means to charge someone with an offense. The sentence context implies that the speaker is advising against charging the person since he has done no harm.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>The shopkeeper would have fined her if <u>he come to know</u> that she damaged the toy on exhibit.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence uses a third conditional structure (if + past perfect, would have + past participle). 'He had come to know' correctly uses the past perfect tense to match this structure.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Sabotage</p>

english.explanation: 'Sabotage' means to deliberately damage or weaken something. Its antonym is 'create', which implies bringing something into existence or building up.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that will improve the underlined part of the given sentence. In case no improvement is needed select &lsquo;No improvement required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>He will lose all his wealth if he <u>doesn&#39;t mends</u> his ways.</p>

english.explanation: The subject 'he' requires the verb to be in the third person singular. 'Doesn't mend' is correct because it uses the contraction 'doesn't' to match the singular subject.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Breakthrough</p>

english.explanation: 'Breakthrough' refers to a significant discovery or achievement. 'Discovery' is the closest synonym in meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A group of people, typically with vehicles or animals travelling together</p>

english.explanation: A 'caravan' is a group of people or animals traveling together, typically with vehicles. The other options (cargo, battery, cache) refer to different contexts.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Lavish</p>

english.explanation: 'Lavish' means excessive or extravagant. Its antonym is 'moderate', which implies restraint or average in quantity or degree.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A person appointed by two parties to solve a dispute</p>

english.explanation: An 'arbitrator' is a neutral person appointed to resolve disputes between two parties. The other options refer to unrelated roles.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>On the horizon</p>

options.value: An event that is likely to happen soon
A plan for the distant future
The successful beginning of a business venture
An event that is likely to end soon

english.correct_answer: 1. An event that is likely to happen soon
english.explanation: The idiom 'on the horizon' refers to something that is about to occur or become noticeable. It is often used metaphorically for upcoming events.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>They didn&rsquo;t repair my phone yesterday.</p>

options.value: My phone did not get repaired yesterday by them.
My phone was not repaired yesterday by them.
My phone could not be repaired yesterday by them.
My phone had not been repaired yesterday by them.

english.correct_answer: 2. My phone was not repaired yesterday by them.
english.explanation: The active voice sentence 'They didn’t repair my phone yesterday' requires conversion to passive voice. Passive structure uses 'be + past participle' (was repaired). Since the original uses 'didn’t,' the negative form is 'was not repaired.' Option 2 correctly follows this structure. Options 1 and 3 use 'get' and 'could not,' which alter the meaning. Option 4 uses past perfect, which is unnecessary.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>In addition to understanding the specific issue to be tackled, the sub-committee examined the larger _______ on the problem.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence discusses examining the 'larger perspective' on a problem. 'Perspective' refers to a broad view or outlook, which fits the context. 'Perception' relates to sensory experience, 'prospective' to future possibilities, and 'proportion' to relative size. Only 'perspective' matches the intended meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Spill</p>

english.explanation: 'Spill' refers to liquid or substances being let fall in drops or poured out. 'Drop' is a direct synonym. 'Feather,' 'filter,' and 'absorb' are unrelated. The context of controlled release or accidental leakage aligns with 'drop.'

The logical order begins with introducing the king (A), followed by his decision (D), his belief it was a joke (B), and the consequence (C). Option 1 (ADBC) maintains this chronological sequence. Other options disrupt the narrative flow.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Directions: Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>Through thick and thin</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'through thick and thin' means to support someone despite challenges. 'Under all conditions' best captures this meaning. Options 1 and 4 are incorrect, and option 2 is unrelated.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1

english.explanation: The phrase likely starts with 'There is a few...' to indicate a small number. 'A few' is correct for countable nouns, though grammatically incorrect in singular contexts. However, context may justify it (e.g., 'a few' as an uncountable abstraction).

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.

english.explanation: Assuming the sentence discusses a relationship, 'companion' fits as a positive entity. 'Disaster' and 'hazard' are negative, while 'enemy' is hostile. The context likely requires a positive match.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: If the sentence contrasts wealth ('rich') with poverty ('poor'), 'rich' is the logical choice. 'Wide' and 'lengthy' are unrelated to the expected context.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: The phrase likely uses 'take' for imperative or suggestion (e.g., 'Take this step'). 'Took' is past tense, 'like,' and 'look' are unrelated. 'Take' fits grammatically and contextually.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: If the sentence discusses physical health, 'body’s' is correct. 'Heart’s' and 'mind’s' relate to emotions/thoughts. 'Health’s' is possessive but less specific than 'body’s.'
